overview:
Joe McCormack, CEO at Adotomi and board member of a number of online marketing companies has been involved in the advertising industry for over 8 years in management positions.

Initially starting his career within the Viacom group at MTV in Soho, London where he managed government and large blue chip advertising campaigns.

After moving to Tel Aviv, Israel, he was a quick adopter into the world of online advertising and joined Target Point Contextual Network as European Agency Manager.

From Target Point he moved to Adsmarket affiliate network in their first sales team where he was the Corporate Business Development Manager for the UK market place.

Since Adsmarket, Joe has gone on to found a wide range of online marketing companies including software house, Epona Technologies and Virtual Currency network, TokenAds.
